remarks: The group power operator commutes with the group operation. (Contributed by Paul Chapman, 17-Apr-2009.) (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
gxcom.1 $e |- X = ran G $.
gxcom.2 $e |- P = ( ^g ` G ) $.
gxcom $p |- ( ( G e. GrpOp /\ A e. X /\ K e. ZZ ) -> ( ( A P K ) G A ) = ( A G ( A P K ) ) ) $.
